item.title: TorvaX | A Revolutionary Experience
item.dc:creator: @g0d_of_war1 g0d of war1
item.description:
@g0d_of_war1 wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:6, topic:552061”][quote author=Elegant link=topic=670979.msg4487071#msg4487071 date=1434777802]

Lol got banned for saying (For a server to grow it has to be unique) guessing owner has a temper because I came on to check it and its pay to win rsps so many of them already, goodluck nonetheless.

(Not going to go far give you a 3 months tops) lmao

Everyone is welcomed at TorvaX and all comments and tips are appreciated.
Unfortunately you were banned due to talking about another server and were causing a racket!
[/quote]

Banning for causing a racket? You cannot hear people all they’re doing is typing. If it is that bad just ignore him if you’re so disturbed.

Servers are just full of authority-seeking kids these days. Banning people for all sorts of aids reasons. As if you have to be nice to everyone or you get banned.[/quote] Never advertise about another rsps :palm: fact you have to lie thats when you know an rsps wont go far & wasnt causing a racket either as I stated in my comment earlier you got mad because I said another pay to win :rolleyes:

Read full topic
